name: Makhani Hiker
description:
Climb up a snowy and icy mountain with the help of the delicious butter chicken and its spicy flavour making you spit fire in order to melt ice cubes blocking your way ! But be careful as this meal is quite heavy and my have unexpected side effects on your body !

This game was made during a workshop where two members of the team had to teach the third one the basics of game development. We took the opportunity to make a game together for the Jame Gam #25 with the theme "Unintentional Side Effects" and a special object to include in the game : the Butter Chicken.

How to play
  • Use Z and D or the left and right keys to move left and right
  • Use SPACE or the up key to jump
  • Use A to eat some butter chicken when you're near a cooking pot to eat some
  • When your food bar is not empty, press E to spit a fireball
Credits
  • Game Design : Eurpie, Gaëtan Piou, Jeffrey Zumkir
  • Programming : Eurpie
  • Level Design : Jeffrey Zumkir
  • Music : Gaëtan Piou
  • Art : https://free-game-assets.itch.io/ with slight modification by Gaëtan Piou
